channel.title: Comments on: REVIEW: Ryan Adams, Easy Tiger, Lost Highway

item.title: By: New Ryan Adams EP in late October, Drawer B
item.dc:creator: New Ryan Adams EP in late October, Drawer B
item.description: [...] Cardinals, entitled Follow the Lights, which follows closely on the heels of his latest full-length Easy Tiger. Two new songs are interspersed with some older ones, all of which were recorded live in the studio [...]
item.content:encoded: […] Cardinals, entitled Follow the Lights, which follows closely on the heels of his latest full-length Easy Tiger. Two new songs are interspersed with some older ones, all of which were recorded live in the studio […]
